# Radio button

A simple way of using radiobuttons
w
<p>
  <label>
    <input type='radio' name="radiodemo">
    <span class="checkable">Select me</span>
  </label>
</p>
<p>
  <input id="radiodemo" checked type='radio' name="radiodemo">
  <label for="radiodemo" class="checkable">Or me</span>
</p>

    <p>
      <label>
        <input type='radio' name="radiodemo">
        <span class="checkable">Select me</span>
      </label>
    </p>
    <p>
      <input id="radiodemo" checked type='radio' name="radiodemo">
      <label for="radiodemo" class="checkable">Or me</span>
    </p>
